title: SGMiner 4.1.153 - GPU Mining Software for Windows (Scrypt Liteco
description:
SGMiner 4.1.153 GPU Mining Software for Windows

This is a fork from CGMiner, which stopped supporting GPU mining as of version 3.7.2

"sgminer is a multi-threaded multi-pool GPU miner with ATI GPU monitoring, (over)clocking and fanspeed support for scrypt-based coins. It is based on cgminer by Con Kolivas (ckolivas), which is in turn based on cpuminer by Jeff Garzik (jgarzik)."

Source: https://github.com/veox/sgminer
